Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest

Class ProjectResource

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.web.rest.ProjectResource
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class ProjectResource extends Object
REST controller for managing Project.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      @PostMapping("/projects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProjectDTO> createProject(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ProjectDTO projectDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      POST /projects : Create a new project.
      Parameters:
      projectDto - the projectDto to create
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new projectDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the project has already an ID
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • updateProject

      @PutMapping("/projects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProjectDTO> updateProject(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ProjectDTO projectDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      PUT /projects : Updates an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectDto - the projectDto to update
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated projectDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the projectDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the projectDto couldnt be updated
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllProjects

      @GetMapping("/projects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllProjects(@PageableDefault(size=2147483647) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, @RequestParam(name="minimized",required=false,defaultValue="false") Boolean minimized) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /projects : get all the projects.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of projects in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getProject

      @GetMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProjectDTO> getProject(@PathVariable String projectName) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /projects/:projectName : get the project with this name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the projectName of the projectDTO to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the projectDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getSourceTypesOfProject

      @GetMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/source-types") public List<SourceTypeDTO> getSourceTypesOfProject(@PathVariable String projectName) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /projects/:projectName : get the "projectName" project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the projectName of the projectDTO to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the projectDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • deleteProject

      @DeleteMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteProject(@PathVariable String projectName) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      DELETE /projects/:projectName : delete the "projectName" project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the projectName of the projectDTO to delete
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getRolesByProject

      @GetMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/roles") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<RoleDTO>> getRolesByProject(@PathVariable String projectName) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /projects/{projectName}/roles : get all the roles created for this project.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of roles in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllSourcesForProject

      @GetMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/sources") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllSourcesForProject(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, @PathVariable String projectName, @RequestParam(value="assigned",required=false) Boolean assigned, @RequestParam(name="minimized",required=false,defaultValue="false") Boolean minimized) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /projects/{projectName}/sources : get all the sources by project.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of sources in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllSubjects

      @GetMapping("/projects/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/subjects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SubjectDTO>> getAllSubjects(@Valid @Valid SubjectCriteria subjectCriteria) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      Get /projects/{projectName}/subjects : get all subjects for a given project.
      Returns:
      The subjects in the project or 404 if there is no such project
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
